entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, introduced as a powerful dark wizard who has defied Voldemort multiple times.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist, mentioned as the one who might be in danger if attacked by Voldemort.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard, interrupting Harry to explain a crucial point.

entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: A place where a mysterious force is kept locked away, mentioned by Dumbledore as containing something more wonderful and terrible than death or human intelligence.

entities.name: room in the department of mysteries
entities.description: A specific room within the Department of Mysteries that contains a powerful force.

entities.name: power the dark lord knows not
entities.description: A mysterious power that Harry possesses and Voldemort does not know about.

relationships.description: Voldemort is unaware of the danger in attacking Harry, which could transfer power to him.
Dumbledore mentions a room in the Department of Mysteries that contains a powerful force.
